Oops. Here are the steps:
1. Perform an export project sets
2. select one or more shared projects
3. Type in a name with no path info (i.e. no slashes or drive letter)
4. Click finish and NPE occures

Fixed.
(FYI, failing to specify a path will result in the file being saved in your
working directory; in my case, /home/james/eclipse).
